Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add AspNetCore MCP server library with dynamic IFunctionProvider integration

Implements a new AspNetCore library (McpServer.AspNetCore) that exposes IFunctionProvider instances as Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools via HTTP endpoints.

Key features:
- Handler-based architecture using ModelContextProtocol SDK 0.4.0-preview.3
- Dynamic tool registration from IFunctionProvider implementations
- McpServerHandlers with ListToolsHandler and CallToolHandler
- Automatic JSON schema generation from FunctionContract metadata
- Disposable server wrapper with dynamic port allocation
- Comprehensive integration tests with MCP client (9 tests, all passing)
- Sample application demonstrating weather, calculator, and file info tools

Technical implementation:
- Uses ASP.NET Core options pattern for configuration
- Builds tool lookup dictionary for efficient execution
- Proper error handling with CallToolResult.IsError
- Tool naming convention: ClassName-FunctionName
- TextContentBlock for MCP protocol compliance
